feed.title: Google Cloud: Service Extensions
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Service Extensions

entry.content: To upload your Wasm plugin code to Artifact Registry, you can use generic format repositories, in addition to Docker repositories. This feature is in Preview.
entry.summary: Use generic format repositories to upload Wasm plugin code to Artifact Registry.
entry.title: Feature: New Artifact Registry support for Wasm plugins

entry.content: Plugins for Cloud Load Balancing help you insert WebAssembly (Wasm) code in a fully managed serverless environment directly into the data path of most Cloud Load Balancing Application Load Balancers. This feature is in General Availability.
entry.summary: You can now insert WebAssembly (Wasm) code into the data path of Application Load Balancers using Plugins for Cloud Load Balancing. This feature is fully managed, serverless, and available in General Availability.
entry.title: Feature: New: Cloud Load Balancing Plugins

entry.content:
Edge extensions help you manipulate request headers early in the request processing lifecycle of global external Application Load Balancers to influence caching and routing decisions. This feature is in Preview.

Learn how to configure an edge extension.
entry.summary: This feature allows you to modify request headers early in the request lifecycle for global external Application Load Balancers, helping to influence caching and routing. It is currently in Preview.
entry.title: Feature: Feature announcement: Edge extensions
